title: Animated Medieval Priest
description:
This pack contains an animated medieval priest character. Animations are split. So it is possible to start each sequence separated like:
animation.Play("Walk");

Animations are the same like we applied to our beggar package. A video of it can be seen here:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WtQ2Yo-lDig
changes: Textures are now located in a sub-folder.
